description.h5: Bring the world of Exandria to life.
description.p: Behold the wonders of the Tal'dorei, one of the continents of Exandria and a land filled with epic adventure. Contained within is a guide to each major region of the continent, complete with story hooks to entice players, new subclass options for your party, and dozens of new spells, monsters, and magic items!
Whether you're a longtime fan of Critical Role and Vox Machina or brand new to the world of Exandria, an experienced Dungeon Master or a first-time player, this is where your legend begins!
